Source.Name: libftdi1
Source.Summary: An open source library to talk to FTDI chips
Source.Description: libFTDI is an open source library to talk to FTDI chips FT232BM, FT245BM, FT2232C, FT2232D, FT245R, FT232H and FT230X including the popular bitbang mode.

Package.Name: libftdi1
Package.Summary: An open source library to talk to FTDI chips
Package.Description: libFTDI is an open source library to talk to FTDI chips FT232BM, FT245BM, FT2232C, FT2232D, FT245R, FT232H and FT230X including the popular bitbang mode.
